metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10997 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Percona XtraBackup before 2.4.20 unintentionally writes the command line to any resulting backup file output. This may include sensitive arguments passed at run time. In addition, when --history is passed at run time, this command line is also written to the PERCONA_SCHEMA.xtrabackup_history table.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> issue introduced in version 2.4.11 in commit https://github.com/percona/percona-xtrabackup/commit/0b38ffc0f30

criterions.comment: percona-xtrabackup: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
